Christlike Deportment 

     In our institutions, where many persons of varied temperaments are brought together, it is necessary that each 
                                                                           244
should cultivate a spirit of unselfishness. Let no one feel that it is his place to mold others to his individual mind or opinions. While each will manifest an individuality, yet it should be an individuality that is under the control of the Holy Spirit. If we are kind and Christlike, there will be a blending of hearts and of interests that will be beneficial to all alike.
